abstract: The United States doesn’t have “right to be forgotten” laws as Europe does, but Google considers some requests to remove information from search results.
snippet: The United States doesn’t have “right to be forgotten” laws as Europe does, but Google considers some requests to remove information from search results.
lead_paragraph: Q.  Is there a “right to be forgotten” in the United States? How do you get false or damaging personal information removed from Google search results?

headline.main: Erasing the Past From Google Search
